name: Golf Jame Gam
description:
2 players or more required!

Minigolf where the first ball to reach the hole becomes the hunter of the other balls.

+1 Point for being the first to reach the hole
+1 Point for successfully hunting another ball
-1 Point for every round you are dead

Everything but the music ("Next to You" and "Black Diamond" by Joth on OpenGameArt) was created by us.

Godot 4's WebGL exports on itch have some problems with firefox, and the itch developers are working on a fix. In the meanwhile, the embed link for this exact game will work for firefox users: https://itch.io/embed-upload/7294570
